name: Flight Tracker
author: ChuckBuilds
description: Advanced flight tracking with live ADS-B data, map visualization, and aircraft details. Displays real-time aircraft positions, flight statistics, and overhead aircraft information with optional map backgrounds.

api_requirements.name: SkyAware
api_requirements.description: Local ADS-B receiver (dump1090/readsb) providing aircraft data

api_requirements.name: FlightAware AeroAPI
api_requirements.description: Optional API for flight plan data (origin/destination)
